title: Show Number of unread emails on TB icon pinned to Win Taskbar
content: Is it possible to have the number of unread emails in the Inbox show on the Thunderbird icon in the Windows 10 Taskbar? This would be very convenient and avoids the need to keep opening up TB to check. I recently tried eM Client, which had this feature, but, returned to TB to avoid other dislikes I found in eM. Thanks in anticipation Robs
creator: meRobs

title: Lost Tags
content:
I have recently updated to TB 128.5.3esr (64-bit) This occurred by the Microsoft Store 'update' feature automatically. Before this occurred, I was able to mark email messages with Tags that I had previous set up but it now appears that even when selecting an appropriate Tag for a particular message, whilst it initially 'coulors' it in accordance with the pre-defined colour, when my cursor is removed from the email message, the Tag is lost [and colouring]! Even when attempting to sort messages by Tags, none appear at all.... I have in my TB a number of different email accounts namely, Apple ones [x3], Hotmail [Outlook now] and Gmail and yet none of them seem to support [or retain] Tags anymore as they once did. Previous TB versions enabled me to use this feature - is there a good reason why it no longer works? Lastly, whilst I don't really know what a 'sandbox' is, I installed TB from the Microsoft Store in the hope that it would remain automatically updated - was this a mistake? Lastly this may assist TB experts of which I am most definitely not one, sadly....

128.5.2esr (64-bit) Release notes Thunderbird Windows MSIX packagethunderbird-MSIX - 1.0
creator: DNBMcC

creator: cri.ruizdeba

title: Automatische Löschung meiner E-Mails
content:
-

Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren,

meine E-Mails aus meinem Posteingang und aus sämtlichen übrigen Ordnern (außer dem Spam-Ordner) werden seit ein paar Tagen scheinbar automatisch von Thunderbird in in den Papierkorb meines GMX-Accounts verschoben. Dass die Löschung meiner E-Mails tatsächlich von Thunderbird aktiv durchführt wird, kann man auch mit Hilfe des Aktivitätenfensters (Tools -> Activity Manager) beobachten.

Sämtliche allgemeine Empfehlungen (Verhinderung eines Fremdzugriffs) habe ich befolgt - ohne dass dies geholfen hätte - zum Beispiel habe ich mein Passwort geändert, die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung bei GMX aktiviert, Virenscans durchgeführt, die Filterregeln kontrolliert (kein Einsortieren in den Papierkorb oder den Gelöscht-Ordner), die Spamfilter kontrolliert (Spam-Mails werden nicht verschoben oder gelöscht) und alle Zugriffsberechtigungen (Logins von anderen Programmen und Geräten) zurückgesetzt.

Was kann ich tun, um meine E-Mails zu retten?

Vielen Dank für Ihre Unterstützung und freundliche Grüße

Volker Werling

-
creator: v.werling

title: Passwords automatically being put in outgoing message body
content:
Recently I have started to see Thunderbird trying to insert passwords or Yubi key codes in the body of messages without my initiating that. I sent a message this morning and I deleted the codes, but T-Bird started re-inserting them.

Any idea what can cause this behaviour?

Thanks, Jim Darrough
creator: jdarrough25

title: How to stop Thunderbird spell check from picking names in the To field and parts of contractions.
content:
Many times when I am forwarding emails or copying and pasting text from an outside source, the spell check will choose a word like "isn't" and highlight "isn" as a misspelled word. This has happened with a number of different contractions.

Additionally, it will pick parts of an abbreviated name in someone's email address in the To: field as a mistake. I do not have the time or desire to constantly, go through a long email and choose 'add to dictionary' or click ignore. Why is it even looking at parts of a contraction, and it should be ignoring the To field altogether.

Is there something wrong with my version or is this how it operates? My TBird is up-to-date: 128.5.2esr (64-bit).
creator: NiagaraMouse

title: Problém s emailem
content: Když si spustím emailového klienta Thunderbird, tak funguje normálně asi 5 minut a pak se asi odpojí, začne se tvářit, že čeká na připojení, na které se ale nikdy nedočkám. Musím ho vždy ukončit a znovu spustit. Pak zase funguje asi 5 minut a vše se stále opakuje. Nevím co způsobilo tuto poruchu jeho chování a nevím jak ji odstranit. Děkuji za radu. Vladimír Racek vr43@seznam.cz
creator: racek43
